Steel Jaws.name: Steel Jaws
Steel Jaws.fullText:
Snapping Testudo Attack 11Steel Jaws

With ferocious strength you slam your shields together, crushing opponents between them as though with enormous jaws.

Encounter        Martial
Standard Action      Melee 1

Requirement: You must be wielding two shields.

Target: One or two creatures

Attack: Strength + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d8 + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Effect: If you hit two targets with this power, slide one 2 squares to a square adjacent to both the other target and to you.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 44.
Steel Jaws.flavor: With ferocious strength you slam your shields together, crushing opponents between them as though with enormous jaws.
Steel Jaws.requirement: You must be wielding two shields.
Steel Jaws.attack:
Strength + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Reflex

Paddlewheel.name: Paddlewheel
Paddlewheel.fullText:
Snapping Testudo Attack 20Paddlewheel

You spin through the battlefield like a tornado, using your shields to buffet and reposition foes as you go.

Daily        Martial
Standard Action      Melee 1

Requirement: You must be wielding two shields.

Effect: You shift 2 squares.

Primary Target: One or two creatures

Primary Attack: Strength + 8 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the primary target 2 squares and knock the primary target prone.

Miss: Half damage, and you slide the primary target 1 square.

Effect: You shift up to 2 squares and make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One or two creatures that are not primary targets

  Secondary Attack: Strength + 8 vs. Reflex

  Hit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the secondary target 2 squares and knock the secondary target prone.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 45.
Paddlewheel.flavor: You spin through the battlefield like a tornado, using your shields to buffet and reposition foes as you go.
Paddlewheel.requirement: You must be wielding two shields.
Paddlewheel.effect: You shift up to 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Paddlewheel.onHit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the primary target 2 squares and knock the primary target prone.
Paddlewheel.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the primary target 1 square.
Paddlewheel.secondaryTarget: One or two creatures that are not primary targets
Paddlewheel.secondaryOnHit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the secondary target 2 squares and knock the secondary target prone.

Shielded Aggression.name: Shielded Aggression
Shielded Aggression.fullText:
Snapping Testudo Utility 12Shielded Aggression

While safe within your shielded shell, you attack with greater power and strike your foes harder.

Daily        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be wielding two shields.

Effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy while using a shield, you can choose to slide the target 1 square or increase by 1 square any forced movement that the attack already grants.


Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 44.
Shielded Aggression.flavor: While safe within your shielded shell, you attack with greater power and strike your foes harder.
Shielded Aggression.requirement: You must be wielding two shields.
Shielded Aggression.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy while using a shield, you can choose to slide the target 1 square or increase by 1 square any forced movement that the attack already grants.
